name: Falls and Fortune (In Effect)
description: In this Round, both sides must spend 1 extra Elemental Die when switching characters.
descriptionraw: In this Round, both sides must spend 1 extra Elemental Die when <color=#FFFFFFFF>switching characters.</color>
descriptionreplaced: In this Round, both sides must spend 1 extra Elemental Die when <color=#FFFFFFFF>switching characters.</color>
